system.requirements:
Tier 2; Agility 35, Ambidextrious, WS 35
Aptitudes: Strength, Offence
system.effect: Character gains Deadly Natural Weapons Trait, and counts as armed even whilst facing a weapon wielding opponent whilst barehanded (or using their own natural weapons). Whilst fihgting barehanded they can re-roll the damage they inflict.

description.value: Character gains Deadly Natural Weapons Trait, and counts as armed even whilst facing a weapon wielding opponent whilst barehanded (or using their own natural weapons). Whilst fihgting barehanded they can re-roll the damage they inflict.
